user_query: I want to organize a family reunion and need medical guidelines for vaccinations and health precautions, as well as email marketing services to send invitations.

TaskList.description: Gather medical guidelines for vaccinations and general health precautions for group events.
Compile the gathered medical guidelines into a summary document.
Research reliable email marketing services with global coverage to send invitations.
Create a draft invitation email to be sent to family members.
Send the invitation email using the chosen email marketing service.
